name: A. Mahmoud and Longest Uncommon Subsequence
statement:
While Mahmoud and Ehab were practicing for IOI, they found a problem
which name was Longest common subsequence. They solved it, and then Ehab
challenged Mahmoud with another problem.Given two strings and , find the
length of their longest uncommon subsequence, which is the longest
string that is a subsequence of one of them and not a subsequence of the
other.A subsequence of some string is a sequence of characters that
appears in the same order in the string, The appearances don’t have to
be consecutive, for example, strings "", "", "" and "" are subsequences
of string "" while strings "" and "" are not. The empty string is a
subsequence of any string. Any string is a subsequence of itself.
